pageContent: Objective: To characterize the effect of preserving the neurovascular bundle (NVB) and of potency on urinary continence after open radical retropubic prostatectomy (ORRP).

metaData.source:
Relationships between erectile dysfunction, prostate cancer treatment type and inflatable penile prosthesis implantation
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/35534219/
